item.title: About
item.description: We â™¥ Haskell, and Functional Programming. But how did this come about in the first place ? Well, we too started out programming in C, C++, & Java with a bit of scripting languages here and there. But our secret passion lay in LISP & its dialects like Scheme, to which we got introduced by the legendary Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs. Our own experience with imperative followed by object-oriented programming, and the recent work with huge amounts of JavaScript frameworks got us convinced that Functional Programming was the way to go.

item.title: Consulting And Services
item.description: I don’t think they tried to market it to the billionaire, spelunking, base-jumping crowd. i did the same thing to gandhi, he didn’t eat for three weeks. i once heard a wise man say there are no perfect men.
